channel.title: 614 FreakScape PlayerVsPlayer
channel.description:
[center][b][size=30pt]614 FreakScape Spawn PVP[/size][/b] [/center]
[center]PLAY http://freakscape.no-ip.org/ NEED ADMINS AND MODS [/center]
[CENTER][SIZE=4]Server Features[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Instant Player vs Player [*]Spawn Gear [*]Dicing [*]Skull PvP Lvling System [*]Cash/Shard Eco [*]Custom Portals at Home [*]Safe PvP at Home [*]Unsafe PvP in other areas [*][/ul]
[SIZE=4]Server Media[/SIZE] [IMG]http://freakscape.no-ip.org/img/image_4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://freakscape.no-ip.org/img/p1.png[/img] [IMG]http://freakscape.no-ip.org/img/p2.png[/img] [IMG]http://freakscape.no-ip.org/img/p5.png[/img] [IMG]http://freakscape.no-ip.org/img/p3.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img819/4638/c9bs.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img577/2026/tcyo.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img809/8519/mm80.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img855/9889/iyra.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img32/7238/l6c7.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img691/6384/uaie.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img811/4197/o77r.png[/img]
[/CENTER] [center]Reasons Why You Should Play
Let's begin with the easy part, there is no HARD grinding to start doing what you like, YES INSTANT PK, you will have a boost start to get all you need for "pking", gear, food, pots and even cash to get better gear and improve your chance to get faster kills. You might ask yourself what is the fun if you have everything, but YOU don't have everything yet! This server has "PK POINT" system that can be spend in the "PK POINT SHOP" for getting that better gear to OWN even more. If you are a beginner in fighting other players and lost all your bank it's easy to get your gear back. Simple Vote every 12 hours and get cash plus points as reward. If you don't like to VOTE, NO PROBLEM you can simple use the money making method at home.[/center]

[center]Reasons Why You Should Play

Let’s begin with the easy part, there is no HARD grinding to start doing what you like, YES INSTANT PK, you will have a boost start to get all you need for “pking”, gear, food, pots and even cash to get better gear and improve your chance to get faster kills.
You might ask yourself what is the fun if you have everything, but YOU don’t have everything yet! This server has “PK POINT” system that can be spend in the “PK POINT SHOP” for getting that better gear to OWN even more.
If you are a beginner in fighting other players and lost all your bank it’s easy to get your gear back. Simple Vote every 12 hours and get cash plus points as reward. If you don’t like to VOTE, NO PROBLEM you can simple use the money making method at home.[/center]
